title: LFT ♥ Preferably an active ranked team G4
body:
I play all roles but prefer adc/support, i have a mic to communicate with the team.
Happy to join any team with silver+ players i would like to climb in ranked 5s
Please add me if you have any questions or want me to play a trial game.
Cheers,
♥ IGN- Queen Of Hearts

replies.body: I'm a supp main, gold 3,  wanna make a team?
REALLY? you had to didn't you haha so mature :P
